title: Cilantro Lime BROWN Rice with Optional Black Beans

instructions.default: Heat gently in a pan with a splash of water or stock to steam.
instructions.Frozen Pint: Defrost. Heat gently in a pan with a splash of water or stock to steam.
instructions.Frozen Pint / NO: Defrost. Heat gently in a pan with a splash of water or stock to steam.
instructions.Frozen Pint / Beans: Defrost. Heat gently in a pan with a splash of water or stock to steam.
